tags: Instrument flight rules for Canadian Forces-Canadian Forces Base Bagotville
full_summary:
=====================================================

**Government Tender Announcment: W0138-22A009 - Air Traffic Control**
=====================================================

**Contract Reference Number:** WS3608306908-Doc3619046210

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Solicitation Number:** WS3608306908

**Publication Date:** April 14, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** May 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User:** Department of National Defence (DND) - Canadian Forces Base Bagotville

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13803024?extsite=MTM4MDMwMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13803024?extsite=MTM4MDMwMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Procurement Details:**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) - Canadian Forces Base Bagotville, in collaboration with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of at least one (1) Instrument Flight Rules (IFR) controller or Visual Flight Rule (VFR) controller to support flight operations.

**Contract Period:**
-------------------

The contract is expected to commence on May 22, 2023, and will continue until further notice. All submissions must be made in accordance with the specified contract terms and conditions.

**Submission Guidelines:**
-------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before May 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any submissions received after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**
-----------------------

Inquiries may be directed to Pierre-Alexandre Simard at pierre-alexandre.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Trade Agreements:**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Regions of Delivery:**
----------------------

The services will be delivered in the Province of Québec, Canada (outside of the National Capital Region), with a specific focus on the Saguenay region.
